alert.note: Alert for Granville; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 8:56PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Person and northwestern Granville Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 856 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Boston to near Semora to near Mayfield. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Concord, Stovall, Bethel Hill, Hyco Lake, Mayo Reservoir, Hyco Marina and John H Kerr Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
